word: PAGE 160. MINISTERIAL INSTITUTES: THE INSTITUTES REFERRED TO HERE WERE HELD QUITE FREQUENTLY IN THE LATE 1880'S AND EARLY 1890'S, SOMETIMES EXTENDING OVER QUITE A PERIOD OF TIME. REFERENCE ON PAGE 401 INDICATES THAT SUCH INSTITUTES WERE QUITE NECESSARY FOLLOWING THE GENERAL CONFERENCE OF 1888, THAT OUR WORKERS MIGHT BE PROPERLY INSTRUCTED AND INDOCTRINATED IN THOSE TRUTHS WHICH THEY WERE PRESENTING TO THE PEOPLE.
